Assertion for mlr3 Objects

Source: R/assertions.R

Functions intended to be used in packages extending mlr3.

assert_backend(b)

assert_experiment(e)

assert_task(task)

assert_learner(learner, task = NULL)

assert_measure(measure, task = NULL, prediction = NULL)

assert_measures(measures, task = NULL, prediction = NULL)

assert_resampling(resampling)

assert_resample_result(resample_result)

assert_benchmark_result(bmr)

assert_param_set(param_set)

assert_param_vals(param_vals, param_set)

Arguments

b

(DataBackend).
e

(Experiment).
task

(Task).
learner

(Learner).
measure

(Measure).
measures

(list of Measure).
resampling

(Resampling).
resample_result

(ResampleResult).
bmr

(BenchmarkResult).
param_set

(paradox::ParamSet).
param_vals

(named list).
